snippet: Apps for walking, running or cycling can offer motivation, or just deliver some interesting information.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column recommends mobile applications that can add to activities like walking, running or cycling; notes eBay's free application for Windows Phone devices has been overhauled.
lead_paragraph: Apps for walking, running or cycling can offer motivation, or just deliver some interesting information.

headline.print_headline: Match Playlist to Pace When Out for a Run
headline.main: While on a Run, Apps to Match the Playlist to Your Pace
